projects.title: Phasmophobia Buddy
projects.description: Unofficial companion app for Phasmophobia, an indie online multiplayer horror game

projects.title: 50 Years of Storms
projects.description: (1964-2015) Atlantic hurricane data presented in a interactive way. Utilizes AWS Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3 & Cloudfront.

projects.title: PDFaaS
projects.description: Serverless stack build with AWS SAM. Provides the generation of PDFs and Images using Google's Puppeteer library running on AWS Lambda

projects.title: Oviedo Fire Department Inventory Reporting System
projects.description: UCF Senior Design Project. Complete inventory reporting tool that featured native iOS & Android applications paired with an Angular2 web application built on the Google Cloud

experience.title: Software Developer
task: Led implementation and development of a company-wide internal GIS React Native mobile application
Assembled a high performance MVT Server using FastAPI
Worked closely with external partners to develop a proprietary data analytics platform for visualizing crowdsourced big data via Deck.GL

experience.title: Full Stack Developer
task: Led implementation and development of key improvements to a inhouse Enterprise CMS (built using Ember JS / Python) resulting in major improvements in content editing & usability
Designed and developed serverless architecture (for both Python & NodeJS microservices) resulting in over 90% reduction in existing infrastructure cost
Collaborated across multiple teams / projects using different technologies like Python, NodeJS, EmberJS, React
Drove IAM (AuthN & AuthZ) implementations utilizing JWT tokens for Single Sign On across a suite of applications

Coordinated closely with Product Managers to understand value proposition of development pipeline to customers and provide guidance on technical complexity and risk to help streamline release and iteration planning

experience.title: Data Analyst
task: Created custom interactive Tableau workbooks leveraging multiple database connections
Was responsible for IAM management for regional resources

experience.title: Grocery Replenishment Specialist
task: Analyzed stock orders to manage inventory levels
Helped with weekly sales forecasting and display planning
Was responsible for training new employees

about.summary: Hi, I like to build things! Currently employed by Crown Castle, where I'm focused on solving complex problems with the best technical solutions.

info.text: When I'm not developing, I love spending time with my fianc√©e Amber, and our dog Louie.
Being born & raised in Central Florida, I have always enjoyed being outdoors.
